name: Data Scientist (Sustainability) Full Curriculum (EQF Level 8)
description: Full curriculum for Data Scientist (Sustainability) at EQF Level 8
program_learning_outcomes: Create new knowledge that advances the field of digital sustainability through rigorous research
Develop theoretical frameworks that integrate sustainability principles with digital transformation paradigms
Design and validate innovative methodologies for measuring and enhancing sustainability in digital contexts
Lead innovative research addressing complex sustainability challenges at the intersection of digital technology and environmental systems
Contribute to policy development and standards for sustainable digital transformation at national and international levels
Advance pedagogical approaches for digital sustainability education and professional development

modules.name: Advanced Sustainability Impact Assessment Methods
modules.description: Cutting-edge methodologies for sustainability impact measurement
learning_outcomes: Evaluate advanced methodologies for sustainability impact assessment.
Critically analyze the strengths and limitations of different impact measurement approaches.
Design innovative assessment frameworks for complex sustainability challenges.

modules.name: AI for Sustainability Optimization
modules.description: Using artificial intelligence to optimize digital sustainability
learning_outcomes: Synthesize environmental impact reduction strategies to support sustainable development goals
Critique the theoretical foundations and emerging trends in digital sustainability approaches in organizational sustainability contexts
Design innovative solutions using sustainable technology practices to address complex sustainability challenges in digital transformation for sustainability
Generate solutions that balance environmental, social, and economic considerations in practical scenarios
Recommend ethical leadership in promoting ai sustainability optimization solutions that prioritize environmental stewardship
Critically evaluate the effectiveness of ai sustainability optimization approaches through evidence-based assessment frameworks
Integrate advanced ai sustainability optimization principles with broader sustainability frameworks to address complex organizational and societal challenges

modules.name: Sustainable Software Development
modules.description: Practices for developing environmentally efficient software
learning_outcomes: Synthesize green software architecture in circular economy applications
Generate innovative solutions using energy-efficient software development to address complex sustainability challenges in digital transformation for sustainability
Integrate software solutions that minimize environmental impact while maintaining performance
Evaluate ethical leadership in promoting sustainable software development solutions that prioritize environmental stewardship
Critically evaluate the effectiveness of sustainable software development approaches through evidence-based assessment frameworks
Integrate advanced sustainable software development principles with broader sustainability frameworks to address complex organizational and societal challenges

modules.name: Digital Sustainability Research Project
modules.description: Research-based exploration of digital sustainability challenges
learning_outcomes: Conceptualize sustainable project outcomes in organizational sustainability contexts
Integrate innovative solutions using sustainability project methodologies to address complex sustainability challenges in organizational sustainability contexts
Transform project management methodologies that integrate sustainability metrics throughout the project lifecycle
Prioritize ethical leadership in promoting digital sustainability research project solutions that prioritize environmental stewardship
Critically evaluate the effectiveness of digital sustainability research project approaches through evidence-based assessment frameworks
Integrate advanced digital sustainability research project principles with broader sustainability frameworks to address complex organizational and societal challenges

modules.name: Digital Sustainability Principles
modules.description: Core principles and frameworks for digital sustainability
learning_outcomes: Formulate sustainable technology practices for addressing environmental challenges
Evaluate the theoretical foundations and emerging trends in sustainability principles to support sustainable development goals
Judge ethical leadership in promoting digital sustainability principles solutions that prioritize environmental stewardship
Critically evaluate the effectiveness of digital sustainability principles approaches through evidence-based assessment frameworks
Integrate advanced digital sustainability principles principles with broader sustainability frameworks to address complex organizational and societal challenges

modules.name: Sustainable IT Leadership
modules.description: Leading organizational change toward sustainable digital practices

Conceptualize the theoretical foundations and emerging trends in sustainable technology practices for sustainable business practices
Compose innovative solutions using environmental impact reduction strategies to address complex sustainability challenges to support sustainable development goals
Integrate solutions that balance environmental, social, and economic considerations in practical scenarios
Evaluate ethical leadership in promoting sustainable it leadership solutions that prioritize environmental stewardship
Critically evaluate the effectiveness of sustainable it leadership approaches through evidence-based assessment frameworks
Integrate advanced sustainable it leadership principles with broader sustainability frameworks to address complex organizational and societal challenges
